short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hop into fun and mischief with Bugs Bunny Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension brings the iconic, carrot-loving Bugs Bunny to life on your new tab, adding a playful touch to your browsing. Easily access favorite websites, add personalized shortcuts, and stay organized with the integrated calendar and clock. Browse the web seamlessly using the built-in search bar.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Enjoy the classic charm of Bugs Bunny in animated splendor.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly access your go-to websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Customize your tab with links you use the most.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay on top of dates and time with an integrated display.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search effortlessly with your preferred search engine.
Explore more cartoon-themed extensions, review our Privacy Policy, or uninstall conveniently through the provided links.
